name: UNIMIND DAO
description: UNIMIND DAO is the first educational DAO that operates fully in Polish language. We aim to provide best educational content for Polish community for free. Our mission is to teach people to think by themselves. We want Web 3 to be inclusive for everyone. People should be able to educate themselves about Web 3 in their own native language.
payDisclosure: We gather funding on Gnosis Safe. Any use of the funds will have to be first voted upon. We will use your funds only to develop the project and not for monetary gains of our individuals. Having said that, in the future we might start paying contributors for their work towards DAO, but this will also need to be voted upon by the community.
